attributes.title: All Hands Meeting
attributes.description:
Created on February 24, 2010 by mkading on Sourcemap.org:

This is a travel avoidance map.   TelePresence and other virtual collaboration tools were used from each of these locations to conduct this Global "all-hands" meeting, physically facilitated in Shanghai with virtual high-def participation and live presentations from each of the indicated locations.
